## Welcome!
Hi there! I'm Sina, a postdoctoral researcher specializing in cancer epidemiology, prevention, and surgical interventions. My work integrates innovative epidemiologic anc clinical research to improve cancer prevention strategies and surgical outcomes.

## Education
**Master of Public Health (MPH)** <br>
Iran University of Medical Sciences | 2023

**Doctor of Medicine (MD)** <br>
Tehran University of Medical Sciences | 2020

## Current Position
**Postdoctoral Research Associate** <br>
Department of Surgery, Washington University in St. Louis, MO
